name: FREE Coloring and Counting - Graphic Dictation
description: Graphic Dictation is the second game of Kids Classes Series by Pinata Party.  Big Christmas Library Update to cheer your Winter Christmas Holidays up: Santa Claus, Snowman, Deer, Fireplace, Christmas Bells, Candles, Christmas Gifts Boxes, Christmas Balls Decorations, Christmas Angel, Christmas Tree. Draw and Color this winter pictures and make a great Christmas Greetings Card for your family and friends!  This school and preschool educational game is the quick and easy way for a child to learn a counting and orientation in dimensions (left, right, up, down and diagonals).  Nice pictures will make educational process much funny and interesting for boys and girls (and even for theirs parents). Gnomes, princesses, cars, animals, plants, people and buildings! Each kid will find there something he would like to!  Choose any picture from big library, which will be always updated with new, follow our hints of amount of steps and direction of your moves to build a right drawing and a take a chance to color it as you wish. Purple camel? Why not? :)  Turn on all your imagination, be creative in your coloring! Save your masterpieces in the gallery of application or on your device and share with your family and friends.
